Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Google Groups to M365 Modern Groups Migration Service
Description:
Google Groups to M365 Modern Groups Migration Service is a 1st party service for migrating Google groups with the M365 Admin center as a new feature, so that Google compete customers moving to M365 would have the ability to automatically create the groups, its members, member conversations and all permissions to M365 Groups without the need to recreate the groups which is the only solution for customers moving from Google.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025
